BusinessLicenseApplication.name: BusinessLicenseApplication
BusinessLicenseApplication.description: Represents an application form submitted by a business owner. This object is available in API version 49.0 and later.

AccountId.description: The ID of the applicant’s account.

AdditionalLocationDescription.description: Additional text describing the applicant’s location.

AmountPaid.description: The amount paid by the applicant.

ApplicantId.description: The ID of the individual who is submitting the business license application.

ApplicationCaseId.description: The ID of the case associated to the application.

ApplicationCategory.description: Categorizes the ways an application can be processed.

AppliedDate.description: The date the application was submitted.

ApprovedDate.description: The date the application was approved.

BusinessTypeId.description: The ID of the business activity associated with the application.

Category.description: The service category for the application.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LicensePermitNameId.description: The ID of the issued license or permit for this application.

LicenseTypeId.description: The ID of the type of license associated with this application.

Name.description: The auto-generated unique identifier for the application.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user that owns this record.

PaymentDate.description: The date when payment was received from the applicant.

PrimaryOwnerId.description: The ID of the primary business owner associated with the business license application.

RequirementsCompleteDate.description: The date when all requirements were met for approval of the application.

SiteAddress.description: Full address of the business location.

SiteGeocodeAccuracy.description: The expected precision of the latitude and longitude values provided for the business.

SitePostalCode.description: Postal or zip code for the business location.

SiteState.description: State or province code for the business location.

SiteStreet.description: Street address for the business location.

Status.description: The submission and approval status of the application. Possible values are: Application Accepted Approved Approved with Conditions Cancelled In Review Inspection Phase Submitted

WasReturned.description: Whether a submitted application was sent back to the applicant due to errors. The default value is false.
